Package uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1

Class Library

java.lang.Object
uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Library
public class Library extends Object
Models a library system with functionality to manage collections of Books, Members and Loans.
Version:
1.0
Author:
M. Shields
See Also:
  • #Book
  • #Member
  • #Loan

  • Method Details

    • addMember

      public void addMember(uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Member member)
      Adds a member to the library's members collection
      It also sets the member's ID number using the library's ID number sequencing logic
      Parameters:
      member - - A member (a Member object)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if null is provided or the provided member's email matches an existing member's email
      See Also:
      • getNextIDNumber()
      • nextIDNumber
      • Member

    • getMembers

      public ArrayList<uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Member> getMembers()
      Getter Method: Returns the members collection
      Returns:
      members - The library's members (ArrayList)

    • getMemberByID

      public uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Member getMemberByID(int idNumber)
      Returns the member with the provided ID number
      Parameters:
      idNumber - The ID number of the member (integer)
      Returns:
      A member of the library (Member instance)
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the member is not found

    • removeMemberByID

      public void removeMemberByID(int idNumber)
      Removes the member with the provided ID number from the library
      Parameters:
      idNumber - The ID number of the member (int)
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no member is found
      IllegalArgumentException - if the member has books that need returning

    • addBook

      public void addBook(uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Book book)
      Adds a book to the library's books collection
      It also sets the member's ID number using the library's getNextIDNumber method
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be added (Book)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided book's ISBN number matches an existing book's ISBN number

    • getBooks

      public ArrayList<uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Book> getBooks()
      Returns the books collection
      Returns:
      The library's books collection (<ArrayList)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The book with the provided ID number
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no book is found.

    • removeBookByID

      public void removeBookByID(int idNumber)
      Removes the book with the provided ID number
      Parameters:
      idNumber - The ID number of the book to be removed (int)
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the book cannot be found
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book is on loan

    • addLoan

      public void addLoan(uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Member member, uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Book book) throws Exception
      Adds a loan to the lib's loans collection
      Parameters:
      member - The member borrowing the book
      book - The book that is being borrowed
      Throws:
      Exception - if member or book do not exist, or if the book is already out on loan

    • getLoan

      public uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Loan getLoan(uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Member member, uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Book book)
      Returns a loan with the provided member and book
      Parameters:
      member - The member who borrowed the book
      book - The book that the member borrowed
      Returns:
      The loan with the provided member and book

    • removeLoan

      Removes a loan with the provided member and book
      Parameters:
      member - The member who borrowed the book
      book - The book that was borrowed
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If loan is not found
